item.description:
Join us on the Boston Common on Wednesday, April 14th, as the Greater Boston Tea Party hosts the Tea Party Express.

Featured speaker is Sarah Palin. Others will be announced soon.

10:00 AM - 1:00 PM

We are receiving calls from all over the East Coast from other Tea Party patriot coming to town for this historic event. We will be hosting two booths where MA residents can write to their elected representatives.

We need volunteers - contact me if you are available for two hours between 8AM and 3 PM.

And we need donations to help fund our project at this event. (No, we are not donating to the tour.) Visit our website to donate.

www.greaterbostonteaparty.com
item.name: Tea Party Express Tour Rally - Boston
